sequence.msg: They don’t pay you or me enough to deal with this error. Click on the button, hold it for 5 seconds, and get a drink- something hard if you got it. You’ll need it.

This is Tim in IT. What error did you receive?  I’d normally tell you to turn it off and back on again but you’re a button masher. Just sit back and take a break or something.
This is Tim in IT. What error did you receive? You tried turning it off and back on again, eh? No, you can’t, because you’re a cooldown operator. Just try something and hope for the best.
Not this again. I’ve reported this bug so many times… *sigh* Just ignore it like the bug they keep ignoring.
(AFK) Watering my plant. I think it's still alive.
(BUSY) Talking to Avondale. Very important meeting, yes.
(AFK) Stacking stones in a river somewhere. Brb
(AFK) Trying to throw Mr. Stickers off my trail. Brb
(AFK) Trying to make my city a better place. Brb
(AFK) Everything has gone 2D. Trying to return to 3D. Brb
